title: Beniwal Music Center permanent IC publish readiness (frontend-only)

requirements.summary: Ensure the frontend build is publish-ready and consistently serves all referenced static assets for a stable IC canister deployment.
acceptanceCriteria: A production (non-draft) deployment is created and the resulting icp0.io URL is stable (does not expire).
Visiting the published URL loads the site successfully (HTTP 200) and does not display “invalid canister” / “Canister ID Not Resolved”.
The published site serves the latest frontend build and static assets correctly (e.g., favicon and page assets load without 404 errors).

file_operations.description: Add concise deployment notes/checklist for producing a production-grade build and publishing to an Internet Computer canister (including common causes of missing assets/404s and how to confirm they are included in the build output). Use the github-export-icp-cli component as the reference for deployment workflow scaffolding; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update image references so they point to committed, publicly served asset paths under frontend/public (preventing runtime 404s for gallery images). Keep all user-facing text in English and do not add new pages/sections. Verify shadcn-ui component usage instructions before implementing.
Add the gallery image asset into the public static folder so requests to /assets/uploads/whatsapp-2026-02-06-02-51-20-am.jpeg are served by the published canister without 404.

requirements.summary: Make it easy to obtain and share the final icp0.io link by displaying a copyable share URL derived from the deployed canister ID.
acceptanceCriteria: A single icp0.io link is produced for the permanent deployment and is verified to load the site in a fresh browser session.

file_operations.description: Add a small helper that constructs the public share URL from a build-time environment value (e.g., a canister ID) and the icp0.io domain, with safe fallbacks when not provided. Verify core-infrastructure component usage instructions before implementing.

Render a small, non-intrusive 'Share this website' area (e.g., near the contact/footer region) that shows the derived icp0.io URL and provides a copy-to-clipboard action when the value is present. Use shadcn-ui primitives already available in the project (do not modify frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Document where to paste the final deployed canister ID (as a build-time environment value) so the UI displays a single shareable icp0.io link, and include a quick verification step (fresh session load). Verify github-export-icp-cli component usage instructions before implementing.
